ing: 1 cup ice cubes, or as needed
1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger berry-flavored vodka (such as New AmsterdamÂ® Red Berry)
des: "This is my creation, an original drink. One unique thing about this recipe, you use a shot glass. It is so delicious. Enjoy."
ins: Fill a cocktail shaker 1/2-full with ice. Pour cranberry juice, vodka, peach schnapps, and triple sec over ice. Cover shaker and shake vigorously; strain into a martini glass.
